content: Award The **Pingat Gagah Perkasa** (**Tentera**) (English: Conspicuous Gallantry Medal (Military)) is a [decoration](/wiki/Awards_and_decorations_of_the_Singapore_Armed_Forces) awarded to members of the [Singapore Armed Forces](/wiki/Singapore_Armed_Forces) for a heroic act of courage and sacrifice, or for outstanding conduct and performance, and selfless devotion to the Service over and above the call of duty. Recipients are entitled to use the post-nominal letters **PGP** The [Pingat Gagah Perkasa](/wiki/Pingat_Gagah_Perkasa) is the civil equivalent award. ## Description - The ribbon is purple with 4 white stripes.
